Sequence Information.Source: Amino acid substitution of indolicidin, bovine cathelicidin analog, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature.Author: Hancock RE, Hilpert K, Cherkasov A, Fjell C.2006
Literature.Title: SMALL CATIONIC ANTIMICROBIAL peptides

Sequence Information.Comments: p>Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (84.62%) toIndolicidin analog HH117W: 42%; R: 25%.Activity: active against P. aeruginosa PAO1 (MIC 16 ug/ml), E. coli (MIC 8 ug/ml), S. typhimurium (MIC 16 ug/ml), S. aureus (MIC 8 ug/ml), S. epidermidis (MIC 2 ug/ml), E. faecalis ATCC29212 (MIC 31 ug/ml), and C. albicans (MIC 8 ug/ml).
